duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, grow, and maintain diversified books of business in property casualty insurance.
Assess risks, determine premiums, set conditions, and negotiate deals to maximize profitability and meet business goals.
Crunch numbers, review data, and identify opportunities for improved growth, profit, and diversification.
Maintain and nurture successful relationships with agents, brokers, and teammates.
Document account reviews, state-compliant sign-offs, referrals, and underwriting guidelines.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field, Professional insurance designation preferred
